item.title: Report E-2025020167
item.description:
Report E-2025020167

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-13T06:18:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-04
  • City: RICHLAND
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO ENTERPRISE SERVICES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 8500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO contacted ERTS regarding a smoking and leaking tote containing hazardous material, Ethylenediamine. A contractor dispatched and observed an estimated 1-ounce release onto the top of a tote from a defective bung cap. Upon further investigation, the contractor determined that the seal on the cap was damaged along with the threads. They replaced the cap and performed a slosh test. The tote passed and will ship on to the Consignee. No waste was generated from the incident. No storm-drains, waterways or soil were involved.

item.title: Report I-2024100134
item.description:
Report I-2024100134

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-11T01:10:49+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-19
  • City: HOLLY SPRINGS
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: WOOTEN TRANSPORTS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 1
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 187778
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Driver came up on a accident that was in the left lane. No lights on the car. When the truck hit the car, the truck and trailer overturned. The dome lid started leaking. The gasket got cut. Emergency personal was called. A dike was formed to contain product.
